panels.description: Overview of the Phoenix-vNext Process Metrics Benchmarking Stack

options.content:
# Phoenix-vNext Unified Process Monitoring Dashboard

This comprehensive dashboard incorporates and compares all five pipeline configurations:
* **Full Pipeline:** Baseline with minimal processing (truth source)
* **Optimized Pipeline (Moderate):** Aggregated metrics with moderate filtering when time series count < 300
* **Optimized Pipeline (Ultra):** Aggressive filtering and delta conversion when time series count > 450
* **Experimental Pipeline:** Using space-saving Top-K selection for processes
* **Observer Pipeline:** Monitors system metrics and controls optimization modes
* **Main Pipeline:** Basic metrics from the minimal collector

options.content:
**Note**: This unified dashboard visualizes all pipeline configurations: Full, Optimized (Moderate & Ultra modes), Experimental, Main, and Observer pipelines.
Some metrics use simulated values where actual pipeline data is not yet available. In production, these would be real metrics from the configured pipelines.
